attributes.action: Ask banks to reduce targets for the number of leads that branches need to generate per week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Banks have not reduced their targets for both the branch and individual cashiers since the economic downturn. Cashiers are being bullied if they do not meet their targets for the week. Most banks are advertising for cashiers as people are leaving the jobs due to the high stress of hitting unrealistic targets. Plus people are getting fed up asking questions when they visit the branch such as 'do you want a loan?' etc.

I would like the govt to intervene with banks as ask them to reduce targets and leads needs per bank.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
